class.name: DataEntity
class.comment: Storage of the observation values with the timestamp and additional metadata. The metadata are height/depth values for profile observation and sampling geometries for trajectory observations. In each observation entry only one value_... column should be filled with a value!

column.name: observation_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: value_type
column.comment: Indicator used by Hibernate to map value specific entities. Valid values are quantity (scalar values in value_quantity), count (integer values in value_count), text (textual values in value_text), category (categorical values in value_category), bool (boolean values in value_boolean), reference (references in value_reference, e.g. link to a source, photo, video)

column.name: fk_dataset_id
column.comment: Reference to the dataset to which this observation belongs.

column.name: sampling_time_start
column.comment: The timestamp when the observation period has started or the observation took place. In the the latter, sampling_time_start and sampling_time_end are equal.

column.name: sampling_time_end
column.comment: The timestamp when the measurement period has finished or the observation took place. In the the latter, sampling_time_start and sampling_time_end are equal.

column.name: result_time
column.comment: The timestamp when the observation was published. Might be identical with sampling_time_start and sampling_time_end.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the observation which can be for used filtering, e.g. GetObservationById in the SOS. Should be a URI, UUID. E.g. http://www.example.org/123, 123-321

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the data/observation identifier, reference to the codespace table. Can be null.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the observation.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the data/observation name, reference to the codespace table. Can be null.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the observation

column.name: is_deleted
column.comment: Flag that indicates if this observation is deleted

column.name: valid_time_start
column.comment: The timestamp from when the obervation is valid, e.g. forcaste observations

column.name: valid_time_end
column.comment: The timestamp until when the obervation is valid, e.g. forcaste observations

column.name: sampling_geometry
column.comment: The geometry that represents the location where the observation was observed, e.g. mobile observations (trajectories) where this geometry is different from the feature geometry.

set.name: parameters
set.comment: Storage of relations between data/observation and related parameter

column.name: fk_observation_id
column.comment: The reference to the data/observation in the observation table

column.name: fk_parameter_id
column.comment: The reference to the parameter in the data/observation parameter

column.name: value_identifier
column.comment: Identifier of the value. E.g. used in OGC SWE encoded values like SweText

column.name: value_name
column.comment: Identifier of the name. E.g. used in OGC SWE encoded values like SweText

column.name: value_description
column.comment: Identifier of the description. E.g. used in OGC SWE encoded values like SweText

column.name: vertical_from
column.comment: The start level of a vertical observation, required for profile observations

column.name: vertical_to
column.comment: The end level or the level of a vertical observation, required for profile observations

column.name: fk_parent_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the parent observation in the case of complex observations like profiles, complex or swedataarray observations.

column.name: fk_sampling_id
column.comment: The id of the sampling this observation belongs to.

column.name: value_quantity
column.comment: The quantity value of an observation (Measurement)

column.name: detection_limit_flag
column.comment: Flag that indicates if measured value lower/higher of the detection limit.

column.name: detection_limit
column.comment: The detection limit

column.name: value_text
column.comment: The textual value of an observation (TextObservation))

column.name: value_reference
column.comment: The reference value (URI) of an observation (ReferenceObservation)

column.name: value_count
column.comment: The count/integer value of an observation (CountObservation)

column.name: value_boolean
column.comment: The boolean value of an observation (Boolean/TruthObservation)

column.name: value_category
column.comment: The categorical value of an observation (CategoryObervation)

column.name: value_geometry
column.comment: The geometry value of an observation (GeometryObservation)

join.comment: Storage of the blog observation value. Separate table because the size of a blob value can be huge.

column.name: fk_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the data/observation in the observation table

column.name: value
column.comment: The blob value of an observation

column.name: value_array
column.comment: The textual value of an observation (SweDataArrayObservation))

column.name: fk_parent_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the parent data/observation

column.name: fk_result_template_id
column.comment: Reference to the result template which holds the structure and encoding.

column.name: observation_i18n_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: fk_observation_id
column.comment: Reference to the data table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the data entity

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the data entity

column.name: value_name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the data entity

column.name: value_description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the data entity
